name: Raccoon World
description:
A wizard who cursed love a 1000 years ago has been reincarnated. Being stronger than before, a wizard casted a spell on Nedoya and Sho-Genzo to be changed to a fox and a raccoon. 

Changed a fox and a raccoon, departure to look forward to finishing a glass bead, dreaming of reincarnation. Doubt they would accomplish their love and reincarnation
